title: Preferred online retail payment methods worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The maximum Share of online shoppers 42.0 is found at Payment Method Credit cards and the minimum is found at Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) where Payment Method is 3.0.
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Payment Method Credit cards and minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The Share of online shoppers is highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The maximum Share of online shoppers 42.0 is found at Payment Method Credit cards and the minimum is found at Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) where Payment Method is 3.0.
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Payment Method Credit cards and minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers and Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has the lowest Share of online shoppers.
The maximum Payment Method Credit cards has got 14.0 times higher Share of online shoppers than the minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
Share of online shoppers at Payment Method Credit cards is 42.0 , second place is  at 42.0, and thirdly is Debit cards at 28.0.
Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin), and Other have a similar Share of online shoppers that is 3.0.
The Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has 2.02 times less Share of online shoppers than average.
The Share of online shoppers is 187.0 if we add up values of all Payment Methods.
